trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when a specified event provider name references a disabled event provider.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的事件提供程序名称引用已禁用的事件提供程序时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: A disabled event provider cannot publish events.
trans-unit.target: 已禁用的事件提供程序不能发布事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class by specifying the error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref>类通过指定描述当前异常的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前异常的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存关于所引发的异常的序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含有关源或目标的上下文信息的对象。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class with an error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref>类使用的错误消息和内部异常。

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前异常的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常实例。
